question_text: Select two best practices when securing a virtual machine downloaded from the internet.
answer_options: Trust that the file has been scanned by the host OS
Inspect the VM's contents and apply appropriate security tools
Run the VM as administrator with full network access
Only download from known and trusted sources
correct_answer: Inspect the VM's contents and apply appropriate security tools
Only download from known and trusted sources
explanation: Downloaded VMs may be pre-infected; validate their contents and secure them before use.
